message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this product! It's a fantastic opportunity to get a unique item at a steal. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to let it go for $100. What do you say?
I'm not sure I'm convinced. Can you tell me more about the product? What makes you so confident I'll love it?
